original: Cervin, Hjalmar, kyrkoherde, Ar-stad, f. 17/12/90 i Okome, Hall. 1., av prosten Reinhold C. o. Maria Cullberg. G. 22 m. Maria Augustinsson. Barn: Martin f. 24, Rut 26, Aina 28, David 30, Gerhard 32, Henrik 34. — Stud:-ex. i Halmstad 09, teol. fil. ex. 10, teol. kand. samt prakt. teol. prov 12, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 13. V. pastor i Laholm 13, v. kommin. i Vasa förs. i Gbg 16, kyrkoadj. i Halmstad o. pred. v. fat-tigv:inrättn. där 17, fäng:pred. där 18-25, kyrkoh. i Arstad sed. 25. Ordf. i Ärstads församl :diakoni.
translated: Cervin, Hjalmar, clergyman, Arstad, born December 17, 1890 in Okome, Halland County, the first child of the pastor Reinhold C. and Maria Cullberg. Married in 1922 to Maria Augustinsson. They had six children: Martin born in 1924, Rut in 1926, Aina in 1928, David in 1930, Gerhard in 1932, and Henrik in 1934. He passed his high school exams in Halmstad in 1909, theology exams in 1910 and practical theology exams in 1912. He was ordained as a priest for the Gothenburg diocese in 1913 and worked as a vicar in Laholm in 1913, assistant minister at Vasa church in Gothenburg in 1916, church assistant and preacher at the poorhouse in Halmstad in 1917, prison preacher in Halmstad from 1918 to 1925, and finally became the vicar of Arstad in 1925. He was also chairman of the diaconal committee for Arstad parish.

structured.name: Hjalmar Cervin
structured.description: Clergyman and former chairman of the diaconal committee for Arstad parish.
